formattedAddress: 29 W 36th St., New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 29 W 36th St., New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: Sammy is my top choice attorney for all real estate transactions without a doubt. He has the expert knowledge and experience to manage my most complex deals while keeping every client well informed. What I value most about Sammy is his rapport with all parties involved and his friendly demeanor. I consider him a vital part of my business to get deals done confidently and quickly. He's generous with his time and patient with first time buyers and sellers when explaining the process. Frankly, some of my deals never would have seen the closing table without him.

originalText.text: Sammy was an absolute pleasure to work with! He was there for me and my wife at every step of the way throughout the home buying process. We appreciated the above and beyond measures he took to ensure we felt comfortable and educated in our decision making. 100% recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a property!

originalText.text: I recently had the pleasure of working with Sam Calvo as my real estate attorney, and I am beyond impressed with the level of service and expertise provided. From start to finish, Sam demonstrated a commitment to excellence that made the entire process smooth and stress-free.

text.text: I recently had the pleasure of working with Sam Calvo as my real estate attorney, and I am beyond impressed with the level of service and expertise provided. From start to finish, Sam demonstrated a commitment to excellence that made the entire process smooth and stress-free.

originalText.text: My husband and I had an excellent experience working with Sammy, our real estate attorney. He was not only highly knowledgeable but also had a cheerful demeanor, always sporting a smile. Sammy patiently guided us through all the intricate details of our property purchase in NYC, making the process remarkably smooth and stress-free. We highly recommend his services for anyone in need of a real estate attorney.

text.text: My husband and I had an excellent experience working with Sammy, our real estate attorney. He was not only highly knowledgeable but also had a cheerful demeanor, always sporting a smile. Sammy patiently guided us through all the intricate details of our property purchase in NYC, making the process remarkably smooth and stress-free. We highly recommend his services for anyone in need of a real estate attorney.

originalText.text: Calvo Law Group was fantastic and helped me through the entire process making sure I understood everything that was going on and keeping it professional but also personal. Sammy made sure I understood all the documents and spent the time to make sure all my needs were satisfied from start to finish. I would highly recommend everyone to use Calvo Law Group and if I need a lawyer in the future I will definitely be using Sammy again.
